title: Bug 49299: Servlet 3.0 chapter 7.1.1 incorrectly describes the effect of custom cookie name on URL rewriting
description: Bug 49299: Servlet 3.0 chapter 7.1.1 incorrectly describes the effect of custom cookie name on URL rewriting
OB: The current implementation of Servlet 3.0 does not follow the behavior described in chapter 7.1.1. When a custom cookie name is used, the URL rewriting still uses the default 'jsessionid' instead of the custom cookie name.
EB: Expected result: If the behavior described in chapter 7.1.1 is to be followed, the Reload link should be 'http://localhost:8080/cookiename/index.jsp;MYSESSIONCOOKIE=658C60E714E9C7C833F4FDA366E0477F'.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Deploy the provided war file as 'cookiename.war'. 2. Access 'http://localhost:8080/cookiename/'.
